document_data.name: Oka Sanai
document_data.mainbody: '''Oka Sanai''' was a retainer of the [[Goshukara clan]] in [[Nakamaru]] around [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Sanai was a noted satirist, writing some pamphlets against the [[Funada clan]].
document_data.History: In 1357 DR, after [[Oka Yoshinaka]] and [[Mashida Kowa]] had clashed with the Gamo brothers, [[Gamo Hidenobu|Hidenobu]], [[Gamo Mitsutoshi|Mitsutoshi]], and [[Gamo Mochikuni|Mochikuni]], thanks to a plot by [[Funada Toyoo]], Sanai was framed for a satirical pamphlet against the three Gamos. Sanai and his friends thought the Gamo had framed Sanai and wanted revenge.
document_data.Personality: Sanai was always ready to offer sound advice and wise counsel to his friends. He disliked physical exertion and always tried to win battles with a minimum of effort.
